```{r}
### Read in datafiles ###
df.fullParams <- read.csv("fullINVparamslist.csv")

seed <- df.testParams$seeds
#seed <- c(123,345,567) just for practice

### read files ###

## VCF files
for(i in 1:length(seed)){
  varNamVCF <- paste("vcf", seed[i]) 
  assign(varNameVCF, read.vcfR(paste(seed[i], "_InversionVCF.vcf.gz", sep="")))
}

## Population Dynamics files
for(i in 1:length(seed)){
  varName <- paste("popDyn", seed[i], sep="") 
  assign(varName, 1:3)
}
```
